title: Client is bugged
body: Both me and a friend are experiencing difficulties logging in. fixing the client does nothing and only restarting the computer works. This is two separate computers so its a bug on your end. if i ever log out the only way to get back in is to restart the computer.

replies.body: It just says an error has occured and to contact support.  has not occurred again since the post. also yes we are on the same network
I'd like to help but just need a little more info.  What error message are you guys getting exactly?  Are you on the same network, like next to each other?

I restarted mine and still can't get back in :( 

halp pls I just want my fix
